long_description: With exceptional design at work, the Giro Amare(TM) helmet combines ultimate protection with maximum venting so you feel protected and ready to ride at the peak of your potential. In-Mold(TM) technology bonds the helmet's tough outer microshell to the impact-absorbent expanded polystyrene liner, creating a light, cool and strong helmet. Roc-Loc(R) 5 suspension fits like a dream, holding the helmet in place effortlessly; anchors directly into the liner for great durability. Roll Cage(TM) reinforcing combines with molding technology that bonds the outer shell to the liner for a light yet strong helmet. Wind Tunnel(TM) vents channel airflow for maximum cooling in the heat of competition.
